description: aluminum folded bank in the shape of a dog house; red slanted roof with shingles; green slanted foot; kitten, 2 puppies in a basket, duck and chicken with butterfly wrap around exterior; at front a dog is lying; knob at front opens the dog's mouth, sticking out a red disc to accept coins; trigger at left front closes mouth and takes coin; key taped to underside
title: "Doghouse" mechanical bank
